fields.description:
Studio -> Code Profiler to profile javascript execution in webviews

Customer has large portions of their application implemented as webviews.

Is it possible to profile javascript code inside webviews?

What if URL is remote and not local html/js code?

If this does not make sense, please advise and I can inform customer.
fields.summary: BBB - Studio -> Code Profiler to profile javascript execution in webviews
